ComicInfo.Summary:
Placed in an unwinnable war against an implacable foe, Sonja is forced to do an inconceivable move that will cost her like no previous battle ever has!
The thrilling re-imagining of the greatest female sword and sorcery hero ever created continues...do not miss this jaw-dropping issue!
ComicInfo.Title: Contagion
